H0.text: where does fungi go on a food web. Decomposer

H1.text: where does fungi go on a food web. Primary Producer

H2.text: where does fungi go on a food web. Herbivore

H3.text: where does fungi go on a food web. the end

A4.text: The primary decomposer of litter in many ecosystems is fungi.

A5.text: Fungi decompose organic matter by releasing enzymes to break down the decaying material, after which they absorb the nutrients in the decaying material.
